Package hep.aida.ref.remote.basic

Interface Summary
AidaUpdatable Interface that is used by the Queue to process updates on a separate thread.
 

Class Summary
BasicAdapter Class that performs data updates for hep.aida.ref Histograms for another IHistogram.
BasicMutableStore This is Basic implementation of Read-Only IMutableStore.
BasicTreeClient This is Basic implementation of AidaTreeClient that support both "Duplex" and "non-Duplex" modes of communication with the AIDA Tree server.
BasicTreeClientFactory  
BasicTreeServant Basic implementation of the AidaTreeServant, no remote stuff.
BasicTreeServer Basic implementation of the AidaTreeServer, no remote stuff.
BasicUpdateEvent  
ServerQueue This is thread-safe queue for UpdateEvents.
TestBasic Test basic client-server interaction for the Basic classes.
UpdatableQueue
